metadata.Title: CVE-2019-9810 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: Incorrect alias information in IonMonkey JIT compiler for Array.prototype.slice method may lead to missing bounds check and a buffer overflow. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 66.0.1, Firefox ESR < 60.6.1, and Thunderbird < 60.6.1.

notes.Note: tyhicks> mozjs contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine

criterions.comment: firefox package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '66.0.1+build1-0ubuntu1').
thunderbird package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '60.6.1+build2-0ubuntu1').
